categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Strix was a major of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3638 BBY Strix was part of Lord Hargrev's Dread Executioners, sent to Oricon on a mission to neutralize the Dread Masters. However, the terror produced by the Sith Lords on Oricon had overtaken Major Strix and he fled the Dread Executioners camp in madness.
